TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookieCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookieCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供用于操作 HTTP cookie 的类型安全方式。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to manipulate HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取使用 cookie属性对象，并编写使用 cookie属性对象。The following code example demonstrates how to read cookies using the property of the object and write cookies using the property of the object. 这两个属性返回对象。Both properties return objects. 如果两个 cookie 任一名为`userName`和`lastVisit`不是在 HTTP 请求中，则它们将创建在 HTTP 响应中。If either of two cookies named `userName` and `lastVisit` are not in the HTTP request, then they are created in the HTTP response. 如果存在两个 cookie，则将显示的 cookie 的属性。If the two cookies exist, the properties of the cookies are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/cs/HttpCookieCollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/vb/HttpCookieCollection.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 可通过访问集合包含传输到中的服务器客户端的 cookie`Cookie`标头。The collection accessible through contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 可通过访问集合包含 cookie 在服务器上生成和传送到客户端在`Set-Cookie`标头。The collection accessible through contains cookies generated on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. ## Examples 以下示例创建一个新的 cookie 集合对象，并使用从客户端收到的 cookie 填充它。The following example creates a new cookie collection object and fills it with the cookies received from the client. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 Cookie 添加到此 Cookie 集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified cookie to the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序，但仅所引用的内部函数的集合中可存在任意数量的 cookie 回收对象发送到客户端。Any number of cookie collections can exist within an application, but only the collection referenced by the intrinsic object is sent to the client. 方法允许将 cookie 集合中的重复的 cookie。The method allows duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 使用方法，以确保 cookie 集合中的 cookie 的唯一性。Use the method to ensure the uniqueness of cookies in the cookie collection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 cookie 集合和新名""、 将 cookie 的值设置为当前日期和时间，和将 cookie 添加到新集合。The following example creates a new cookie collection and a new cookie named "LastVisit", sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the new collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

An array of cookie names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含客户端的 cookie 集合中的 cookie 的名称的字符串数组。The following example creates a string array containing the names of the cookies in a client's cookie collection. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例返回 cookie 集合中的每个 cookie、 检查它是否名为"LastVisit"和如果找到"LastVisit"，则会更新其值为当前日期和时间。The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命名的 cookie 不存在，则此方法创建一个新的 cookie 具有该名称。If the named cookie does not exist, this method creates a new cookie with that name. ## Examples 下面的示例捕获到新的 cookie 集合客户端发送的 cookie 集合、 检索名""从新集合，并更新的 cookie 的值为当前日期和时间。The following example captures the cookie collection sent by the client into a new cookie collection, retrieves the cookie named "LastVisit" from the new collection, and updates the cookie's value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有指定的 cookie`name`不存在于集合中，不会引发异常。If a cookie with the specified `name` does not exist in the collection, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例从集合中移除一个 cookie。The following example removes a cookie from the collection. span.span: The object to update.

summary.span: 更新 Cookie 集合中现有 Cookie 的值。

span.span: Updates the value of an existing cookie in a cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先检查以查看是否 cookie 已存在于集合中，如果是这样更新它。The method first checks to see if a cookie already exists in the collection and if so updates it. 方法不允许 cookie 集合中有重复的 cookie。The method does not allow duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 若要在 cookie 集合中添加重复的 cookie，使用方法。To add duplicate cookies in the cookie collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例更新的现有 cookie 的值。The following example updates the value of an existing cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
